title: Admissions & Aid  · Angelo State University
description: We are excited you are considering applying to Angelo State! This page has all the details on admissions, tuition and fees, financial aid and scholarships.

headings: What kind of student are you?
Not sure what type of student you are?
paragraphs: Go Farther. Go as a Ram.
I will be afirst-time college student.
If you have no college credit or you earned college credit before graduating high school, you are a first-time freshman.
I want totransfer to ASU.
If you have attended another college or university and want to come to Angelo State, you are a transfer student.
I will be agraduateordoctoralstudent.
If you already have an undergraduate degree and are looking to pursue your master’s, you are a graduate student. If you are pursuing a doctorate degree, you are a doctoral student.
I am aninternational student.
If you are a student who lives outside of the United States, you are an international student.
I am currently in themilitaryor aveteran.
We’re here to make your transition into higher education as seamless as possible.
I want to takedual creditat Angelo State.
If you want to take college classes while still in high school, you are a dual credit student.
Earn your degree wherever you are.
Learn More
Seeall application typesor get in touch with one of ouradmissions counselors.
We’re committed to keeping your academic dreams and goals within reach. Receiving your education from Angelo State will be one of the best investments you’ll ever make.

Congratulations! We can’t wait to welcome you to the Ram Family.
Next steps
Turn your dreams into reality at Angelo State. We’ll stop at nothing to help you succeed, and we look forward to connecting with you online or in person at an admissions event or tour.
Admissions Events
Campus Tours
Meet the Ram Fam
Take a virtual tour
Explore our beautiful campus from the comfort of your own home.
Or better yet,come see us in personfor a campus tour!
If you want to go fast, go alone. But if you want to go far, go together.
